objective: Validate a task document against MyFlow policy requirements and generate validation report

input.name: task_path
input.desc: Path to task markdown file to validate

input.name: report_output
input.desc: Where to save validation report (defaults to task folder)

item.check: Path is valid and file is readable
First line matches pattern

item.requirement: Status History table exists and properly formatted
item.check: Markdown table with correct headers
item.headers: | Timestamp | Event Type | From Status | To Status | Details | User |

item.requirement: At least one history entry exists
item.check: Table has at least one data row
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ
Transitions follow allowed paths from Section 3.4

item.requirement: Current status matches last history entry
item.check: Most recent entry's "To Status" is authoritative
At least one requirement listed
Each requirement is clear and can be verified
Compare with PBI acceptance criteria
Contains information about how to implement
Specific file paths mentioned
Files in plan appear in Files Modified list
Contains verification steps

item.requirement: Verification steps are specific and actionable
item.check: Each step describes HOW to verify
Each requirement has corresponding verification
PBI ID can be derived from task path or content

item.requirement: If InProgress, no other tasks InProgress in same PBI
item.check: Max concurrency: 1 rule
No missing history entries for state changes

item.requirement: If Done, Implementation Notes section exists
item.check: Completed tasks have implementation documentation

step.title: Load and Parse Task
step.action: Extract task_id from path or title
step.halt-if: File not found or not readable

step.title: Load Parent PBI for Context
step.action: Extract PBI acceptance criteria for comparison
step.note: Continue even if PBI not found - mark items as N/A

step.title: Load Task Index for Concurrency Check
Run Validation Checklist
step.mandate: For EVERY item in validation checklist, WITHOUT SKIPPING ANY:

for-each-item.action: Search document for evidence (quotes with line numbers)

mark-as.option: âœ“ PASS - Requirement fully met (provide evidence)
âš PARTIAL - Some coverage but incomplete (explain gaps)
âœ— FAIL - Not met or severely deficient (explain why)
â– N/A - Not applicable to this task (explain reason)

step.critical: DO NOT SKIP ANY ITEMS - validate EVERYTHING

step.title: Generate Validation Report
Display Summary to User
step.action: HALT - wait for user to review report

critical-rules.rule: NEVER skip validation items - check EVERYTHING
ALWAYS provide evidence (quotes + line numbers) for marks
Think deeply about each requirement - don't rush
Save report to task folder automatically
HALT after presenting summary - wait for user review
Be thorough - quality validation prevents issues later
